OrgName: Fidelity Information Services, Inc. c/o Fidelity National Information Services, Inc.
activities: This Safe Harbor certification applies to software and services provided by the ACBS, International, and Human Resources divisions of Fidelity Information Services. LLC (FIS), an Arkansas corporation.  FIS receives data from the EU in connection with the origination and servicing of commercial loans on behalf of FIS clients in the EU.  FIS also receives client data from the EU in connection with the testing of systems and software applications.  In this capacity, FIS does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of FIS clients.  FIS also receives human resources data from the EU for employment related purposes.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Fidelity Information Services will cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for resolution of any disputes regarding off-line, on-line human resources data from the EU. Disputes regarding off-line, on-line data from EU or Switzerland clients will be resolved through the International Centre for Dispute Resolution (www.adr.org) American Arbitration Association (AAA).
